r.s: DataSource driver using PEAR::DB and an SQL query
r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::DB and an SQL query.
r.n: - The solution for bug #9913 in release 0.1.7 introduced problems with the row count when some kinds of subqueries were used. The new solution for the bug is: If the driver detects a subquery (indicated by two occurences of "SELECT" in the query), it will not modify the query, but will run the query and determine the number of rows then. It is recommended to specify a special row count query for complex queries via the 'count_query' option. (thanks to Tom Atkinson and Harry School)
